Articles.Content: Alright, So I had this idea that we could take a whole bunch of historical craft that are capable of docking and putting them in a sort of "Orbiting space vehicle museum" where they're all docked to a central truss with a bit of power going and maybe even a space walkway to get in one of them. I have no modding experience, but I thought that it'd be an idea worth sharing... If I'm right, it's somewhat like in the Star Trek movies, where all the ships are all docked.. Hey, we could even add the Enterprise(s)... Anyways, food for thought.
